message.content: {"given_definition_quality":40,"better_definition":"cup; a container for drinking","sentence":"我有一个杯。","image_prompt":"A single simple cup sits on a table, sunlight coming through a window. The room is calm and empty, outside the window the world looks a little abandoned, colors are soft and washed-out, in the style of a gentle apocalypse animation. The image focuses on the cup, making it the main subject, with a subtle glow from the light.","sentence_translation":"I have a cup."}
